t: The Aflac duck is 20 years old. Here’s how he’s changed the insurance world | CNN Business
s: February 6, 2020 - Insurance is boring. You have it because you need it, not because you want it. So it’s amazing to think that insurance ads are among the most amusing on TV. And the Aflac duck, who’s been quacking the company’s name for 20 years, is a big reason why.
